original: Lundström, Hans Evert, distriktslantmätare, Visby, f. 24/10/01 i Sollefteå av ing. Bernhard L. o. Hanna Stenbeck. G. 26 m. Karin Liljefors. Barn: Hans’ f. 27, Lennart 30, Lars o. Mats 40. — Stud:ex. 20, lantmät:-ex. 26, kulturtekn. ex. 29. E. lant-mät. i Malmöh. län 26-28, i Örebro län 29-32, i Krist, län 32-34 samt i Södermani. län 34-36, byråing. i lantmät:-styr. 36-38, distr :’lantmät. i Gotl. mell. distr. sed. 38.
translated: Lundström, Hans Evert, district surveyor, Visby, b. 24/10/01 in Sollefteå, to engineer Bernhard L. and Hanna Stenbeck. Married on 26 m. to Karin Liljefors. Children: Hans, b. 27, Lennart, b. 30, Lars and Mats, b. 40. — Completed secondary school (stud.ex.) in 1920, surveyor degree (lantmät.ex.) in 1926, cultural technology degree (kulturtekn.ex.) in 1929. Worked as a surveyor in Malmö County from 1926-1928, in Örebro County from 1929-1932, in Kristianstad County from 1932-1934, and in Södermanland County from 1934-1936. Served as an administrative officer in the surveyor board from 1936-1938, and as a district surveyor in the Gotland middle district since 1938.

structured.name: Hans Evert Lundström
structured.description: Hans Evert Lundström was a district surveyor in Visby. He was born on October 24, 1901, in Sollefteå to engineer Bernhard L. and Hanna Stenbeck. On May 26, 1926, he married Karin Liljefors. They had four children: Hans (born in 1927), Lennart (born in 1930), Lars and Mats (born in 1940). Hans completed his secondary school education in 1920, obtained a surveyor degree in 1926, and a cultural technology degree in 1929. He worked as a surveyor in Malmö County from 1926 to 1928, in Örebro County from 1929 to 1932, in Kristianstad County from 1932 to 1934, and in Södermanland County from 1934 to 1936. From 1936 to 1938, he served as an administrative officer in the surveyor board, and since 1938 he worked as a district surveyor in the Gotland middle district.
